item.title: eSuite Search Wizards
item.dc:creator: dava-LOC
item.description: Information The wizard is a powerful search assistant. It boosts efficiency by offering multiple search fields and allowing layout customization. All search-related elements are grouped in the same window. Display the wizard The wizard is available across modules, from certain entries in the Launcher. item.title: eSuite Navigation
item.dc:creator: dava-LOC
item.description: Information TheeSuitesoftware uses a uniform interface consistent across all modules. This helps in easily finding information and functionalities. Layout The eSuite software features a clean and versatile layout for easier navigation. The overall interface is split into several sections around a central work area.
